descriptionlist.description: Back at it again, adding even more icons to Lotus Dark.

This theme adds icons for more apps with the Lotus Dark style.

  • Citrix Workspace
  • GitHub
  • Greenchoice
  • Installer
  • Keybase
  • Microsoft Teams
  • Mijn KPN
  • Mijn Robeco
  • Mijn Zilveren Kruis
  • New York Pizza (Dutch variant)
  • NOS
  • Picnic
  • Pokemon Home
  • Ubiquiti UniFi Network
No screenshots for this item. No options to configure. Toggle the theme in Anemone / Snowboard
